Class FlyCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.input.FlyByCamera
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g05.canvas.jme.FlyCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.input.controls.ActionListener, com.jme3.input.controls.AnalogListener, com.jme3.input.controls.InputListener

    public class FlyCamera
extends com.jme3.input.FlyByCamera
    The Class FlyCamera let the user to use the flycam on the CanvasJme
